divs: sighting details 1. where were you and what were you doing at the time? i was down at a football field playing football. 2. what made you first notice the object? stationary light 3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it? ufo 4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail. it was bright then it dimmed to the point where i could not see it. this happened multiple times 5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object. happy\excited. 6. how did you lose sight of the object? it dimmed down and disappeared
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Feasterville
There were no other sightings in Feasterville on or around September 20th 2012
Summary: It was bright then it dimmed to the point where I could not see it
